description.german: Du hast alle anderen Trophäen gesammelt.

description.german: Du hast jeden Tag 3 Sterne verdient.

description.german: Du hast 3 Sterne in allen 12 Minispielen verdient.

description.schinese: 已在 12 个迷你游戏中得到 3 颗星。

description.brazilian: Ganhou 3 estrelas em todos os 12 minijogos.
description.vietnamese: Kiếm được 3 sao trong tất cả 12 trò chơi nhỏ.

description.german: Du hast Oliver in jedem Level gefunden.

description.brazilian: Encontrou o Oliver em todas as fases.
description.vietnamese: Tìm chuột Oliver trong mọi màn chơi.

description.brazilian: Ganhou 3 estrelas em todas as fases de desafio.

description.english: Assisted John during your first emergency case as an intern.

description.thai: ช่วยจอห์นในเคสฉุกเฉินแรกของคุณในฐานะแพทย์ฝึกหัด
